entry.source: {F812}Take-Mikazuchi\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,411212}I'm not gonna go easy on you, even{F801}if you are just a human.{F801}{F802}The creed of the warrior gods says{F801}to always give your all against an{F801}opponent, no matter who it may be!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Take-Mikazuchi\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,411212}I'm not gonna go easy on you, even{F801}if you are just a human.{F801}{F802}The creed of the warrior gods says{F801}to always give your all against an{F801}opponent, no matter who it may be!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Take-Mikazuchi\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,411203}That was pretty good. Kind of a shame{F801}you're just a human!{F801}
